item.title: GigE and FastE Bandwidth Services
item.description:
Companies routinely upgrade their bandwidth from older technologies like T1 lines to faster Ethernet options, often without significant cost increases. However, for those requiring substantial bandwidth, choices beyond these basic levels are necessary. Carrier Ethernet is becoming the preferred choice for medium to high bandwidth needs, replacing traditional DS3, T3, and SONET technologies. Ethernet offers cost advantages and greater flexibility in provisioning. Lower bandwidth Ethernet services commonly utilize existing copper telephone lines...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/gige-and-faste-bandwidth-services/
